name: ArkLord and the seven sins
description:
Arklord and the seven sins is an action game, metroidvania style mixed with Soul-like style of 2D side view game.

   This project was created by a group of students who are passionate about the difficulty and style of this type of game. made us very focused on it Even now it's an easy game. But it filled our souls.

   once upon a time kingdom of eden A kingdom full of starving and hungry people. One day, the Seven Sins Clan entered the kingdom and gradually turned people into demons. The king therefore commanded Michael The Knight Leader and his allies go to eradicate the demonic cult.

   This game is based on the Archangel theme. We have reinterpreted it with angels serving God. Become a knight who is loyal to the king.

control

A - walk left

D - walk right

W - jump

E - talk

I - fireball

U - slash

This is a 2D action game that focuses on exploration and the story of a kingdom. We will have to find a way to travel in different places. and find out the truth about the Seven Deadly Sins cult.

This game is not finished yet, it will be finished by 01/10/2021.
